actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to require immediate construction on an emergency basis of an erosion control structure on Tangier Island, Virginia.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to direct the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to design and construct an erosion control structure to protect Tangier Island, Virginia. Stipulates that such project is exempt from requirements otherwise applicable to such a project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to require immediate construction on an emergency basis of an erosion control structure on Tangier Island, Virginia.
